Title: Web Portfolio | Francisco Castilleja | Computer Systems Engineer
Description: Welcome to my web portfolio, where you can explore my projects and achievements. Discover my experience and skills in the world of technology.
Exp_1_Description: I developed a local web platform to manage patient records and operating rooms in a hospital, replacing paper-based processes. The system improves the organization of medical information and prevents errors and data duplication.
Exp_2_Description: I developed a local web platform for managing Imaging studies, improving information organization and access. I participated in requirements gathering and frontend development, including search and filtering features.
P_1_Description_1: Planify is a platform designed to create and organize events in a simple and efficient way.
P_1_Description_2: It allows users to design invitations, manage event tasks, send them via WhatsApp or email, and review the list of confirmations all in one place.
P_2_Description_1: Project developed to implement a functional and intuitive shopping cart.
P_2_Description_2: It includes product management, automatic subtotal updates, and smooth navigation for the user.
P_3_Description_1: This project provides fans of the MCU with a clear and updated chronological order.
P_3_Description_2: Additionally, it allows users to rate projects and keep track of upcoming releases.
P_4_Description_1: Project developed for the Supabase Hackathon 2024.
P_4_Description_2: Developed with the aim of providing the chronological order of the Saga.
P_5_Description_2: Scroll and responsive menu were adjusted, optimizing images and changing the icon.
